data.name: Tether
data.detailed_description:
ROLL
Use boost to reach rapid speeds while Rolling and speed across landscapes.

SWING
Tether to any surface and use boost to swing around terrain.

GLIDE
Gain height then Glide over long distances as you soar through the air. Trade height for speed and spiral to the ground before leveling out with tremendous acceleration.

EXPLORE

Traverse many different landscapes as you search for the mysterious Portal Gems. Use them to travel through locked Portals and gain access to new worlds.

COMPETE

Verse your friends or others online and compete in exciting game modes like Swingball, Osmo, Race, and Swingshot.

SWINGBALL

Defend your goalpost and try to score against your opponent by hitting the ball into theirs! First to 3 wins.

OSMO

Avoid colliding with others while attempting to gain the most speed possible without stopping. If two or more players collide the one with the most speed will remain, the others will be eliminated. Try and last as long as you can, the last one remaining wins.

RACE

Be the first to cross the finish line and win the race! Try to avoid the obstacles.

SWINGSHOT

Your aim is to swing far enough to reach the finish line, but as close as possible to the center of the target. Reaching the middle of the target will provide the most points, where as the outer regions offer the least. Not finishing at all provides no points. The one with the most points wins!

data.short_description: With the Tether Tech Roller (TM) you can Swing, Roll, Jump and Glide at great speeds without any injury! Explore vast landscapes and compete in the Swingball Arena, as well as other magnificent game modes like: Osmo, Racing and Swingshot. Play together in Co-op and Split-screen locally or online. Get your Tether Tech Roller (TM) today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or Newer, ATI 7950 or Newer
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen (Steam Controller works natively on Mac)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or Newer, ATI 7950 or Newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More than one Gamepad or Controller required for Splitscreen
